attributes.action: ensure that "Men Working Overhead" signs used on construction sites are no longer used and that gender neutral signs are used instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's not just men who might be working on a construction site - lots of women do too.  

But construction companies only display the standard "Men Working Overhead" health and safety signs.  This sends a really backward message to society about a workforce already riddled with gender stereotypes.
